result.markdown: --- title: 'USCbiostats R Bootcamp for Scientific Computing 2020' description: "a workshop on automatic reports with rmarkdown" date: '2020-08-13' categories: - presentations - r --- ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/USCbiostats/rbootcamp/master/fig/hex-stickers.png) I gave a workshop on **Automatic Reports with RMarkdown** at [USCbiostats R Bootcamp for Scientific Computing 2020](https://github.com/USCbiostats/rbootcamp). Github repo: [](https://github.com/USCbiostats/rbootcamp/tree/master/day3) Slides available here: [link](https://xukeren.github.io/usc-rbootcamp-day3-talk/day3_slides_20200813/slides#1)
